name: the Corruerunt - Early Access
description:
the Corruerunt

WASD - Move

Space -Jump

LeftShift (if holding) + W- run

Hold B - Opens Buildmode (if have 5 or more woods)

Tab - Shows inventory and building inventory.

Hold B and press "1" key on keyboard - Builds home if you have 20 or more woods

Hold B and press "2" key on keyboard - Builds home if you have 5 or more woods and 20 or mere sticks.

Mouse Scroll wheel Up & Mouse Scroll wheel Down - Changes between received items

Esc - Pause

Coming Updates!!!: Day Counter  fow  surviving days. / adding mobs for adrenalinefull fights & survives.

Find the Cave & Try to Survive!!!
